      • getOutputCounts

        public Map<byte[],Long> getOutputCounts()
        since the splitting process may create multiple output files, we need a map regionRecoverStatMap to track the output count of each region.
        Overrides:
        getOutputCounts in class WALSplitter.LogRecoveredEditsOutputSink
        Returns:
        a map from encoded region ID to the number of edits written out for that region.
